# Environmental Data Science Opportunities {.unnumbered}

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(reactable) # create tables
library(tidyverse) # wrangling
library(googlesheets4) # read in google sheets
```

Environmental Data Science (EDS) opportunities are listed here.

## EDS Programs

EDS programs that provide EDS or related curriculum.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# read in googlesheet "masters-program"
eds_programs <- googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y5_7cpGG1eb56cnMZl9sb-AbfaSCc3hidZjs5L7VZoA/edit?usp=sharing", sheet = "masters-program")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# create table using reactable
reactable::reactable(eds_programs,
                     searchable = TRUE,
                     defaultPageSize = 3,
                     highlight = TRUE,
                     striped = TRUE,
                     columns = list(
                       program_title = colDef("Program",
                                              # adds link 
                                              cell = function(program_title, index) {
                                                url <- eds_programs[[index, "link"]]
                                                htmltools::tags$a(href = url, target = "_blank", as.character(program_title))
                                              },
                                                ), # EO program_title colDef
                       organization = colDef("Organization", minWidth = 110),
                       short_description = colDef("Description", minWidth = 200),
                       link = colDef("Link", show = FALSE)
                     ), # EO columns list
                     defaultSorted = "organization"
                     ) # EO reactable
```

## EDS Organizations

EDS organizations and more that offer workshops or other EDS support.

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# read in googlesheet "other-organizations"
eds_orgs <- googlesheets4::read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y5_7cpGG1eb56cnMZl9sb-AbfaSCc3hidZjs5L7VZoA/edit?usp=sharing", sheet = "other-organizations")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
# create table using reactable
reactable::reactable(eds_orgs,
                     searchable = TRUE,
                     defaultPageSize = 3,
                     highlight = TRUE,
                     striped = TRUE,
                     groupBy = c("organization"),
                     columns = list(
                       organization = colDef("Organization", minWidth = 190), 
                       affiliation = colDef("Affiliation"),
                       type_of_support = colDef("Type of Support", minWidth = 110,
                                              # adds link 
                                              cell = function(type_of_support, index) {
                                                url <- eds_orgs[[index, "link"]]
                                                htmltools::tags$a(href = url, target = "_blank", as.character(type_of_support))
                                              } # EO cell
                                              ), # EO type_of_support colDef
                       details = colDef("Description", minWidth = 200),
                       link = colDef("Link", show = FALSE)
                     ), # EO columns list
                     defaultSorted = "organization"
                     ) # EO reactable
```
